events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster for a software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will contact you soon.
We conducted an initial screening of your skills and experience relevant to the software engineer role.
Thank you for the opportunity to interview. I am available to discuss the role and my fit for the engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-07 at 10 AM UTC with our senior developer.
The technical interview was successfully completed and your coding skills and problem-solving abilities were impressive.
An HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-09 at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team and company.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role with a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your prompt feedback, and we are happy to hear you find the offer appealing and look forward to joining.
You have accepted the offer. We are thrilled to welcome you to our engineering team and start the onboarding process.
The onboarding process has started, and you have been given access to all the necessary resources to begin your role.
The hiring process is now successfully closed. We look forward to your contributions as a valued member of our engineering team.
